name: Protect the Mothership
description:
Protect the mothership and attack enemies. 

Supports a gamepad using the left stick, and A/Cross to fire. Also supports using the keyboard, and uses WSAD to move, and space to fire. Keyboard may work while a gamepad is plugged in and not interacted with, but may need the controller unplugged.

Red indicators tell where enemies are. Try not to crash into them, as they will damage you, but you will also damage them.

Estimated completion time: 5 minutes or less.

I might add more features to this later on, but not sure at the moment.

This was done for the Ludum Dare Game Jam.
Artwork - Me

Music - Me
